column5: Energy Technologies and Management Master Program for ProfessionalsThe Energy Technologies and Management (ETM) Master Program for Professionals was started by Sabancı University, Faculty of Engineering and Natural Sciences in the 2013-2014 academic year for executives and aspiring professionals who wish to specialize in energy industry, and continues with new students, content that evolves constantly based on the requirements of the industry, and a widening circle of professors.The program is based on three pillars to serve the needs of its participants and the energy industry:
